Detailed Description

This class handles the vertex declarations used by moo.

Vertex declarations are stored on disk (in res\shaders\formats ), and created using this class.

A example vertex declaration looks like this:

 *  <root>
 *  	<POSITION>
 *  		<type> FLOAT2 </type>
 *  	</POSITION>
 *  	<TEXCOORD>
 *  		<stream> 1 </stream>
 *  		<offset> 0 </offset>
 *  		<type> FLOAT2 </type>
 *  	</TEXCOORD>
 *  </root>
 *

In this example, the declartion defines two streams: an xy position type stream, and a uv texture coordinate stream. The POSITION and TEXCOORD sections map directly to D3D shader semantics. In the following example:

 *  <root>
 *  	<POSITION>
 *  		<type> FLOAT3 </type>
 *  	</POSITION>
 *  	<TEXCOORD>
 *  		<type> SHORT2 </type>
 *  	</TEXCOORD>		
 *  	<BLENDWEIGHT>
 *  		<type> SHORT2 </type>
 *  	</BLENDWEIGHT>	
 *  </root>
 *

There is a single stream stream containing interleaved xyz postion, uv texture, and blend weight information.

VertexDeclaration * Moo::VertexDeclaration::get ( const std::string &  declName  )  [static]

This method returns pointer to a vertex declaration object given a name.

It will attempt to load vertex declaration from shaders/formats/* if not found.

Returns:
true if successful, false if declaration not found and loaded.
